alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PINE AND SOUTHERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kettle River, or 24 miles southeast of Big Sandy Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kettle River around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Barnum, Mahtowa, Nemadji and Holyoke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota...and northwestern Wisconsin.
